meta.title: The Enchanted Apiary
meta.subtitle: The Hive Architecture
meta.quote: "Just as chemistry's periodic table unlocked modern science, the Hive's table will unlock scalable, predictable software architecture."

philosophy.title: From Hexagons to Honeycombs
philosophy.description: Traditional Hexagonal Architecture is powerful but abstract. The Hive Architecture grounds it in nature, providing a rich vocabulary for complex systems.

atcg.title: The Four Fundamental Primitives
atcg.desc: These four elements—<1>A</1>ggregate, <3>T</3>ransformation, <5>C</5>onnector, and <7>G</7>enesis Event—form the <9>ATCG</9> code. Just like DNA, they combine to create complex, living software systems.

chemistry.title: The Chemical Bonds of Logic
chemistry.desc: Just as Carbon, Hydrogen, Oxygen, and Nitrogen combine to form the molecules of life, our software primitives combine to form the molecules of logic.

dynamics.title: System Dynamics & Evolution
dynamics.desc: A Hive is not static structure; it is a living process. Understand the protected geometry of the core and the lifecycle of every component.

agent.title: Autonomous Agents
agent.desc: The "Queen Bee" (Agent) can autonomously call tools (Worker Bees), analyze the results, and call herself again to solve complex problems.

immune.title: Self-Healing Architecture
immune.desc: The Hive detects mutations (bugs) and deploys antibodies (fixes) automatically. Connecting to live source:

patterns.title: The Sacred Sequences
patterns.desc: Watch the flow of information as "Sacred Codons" execute logic.

learning.title: Choose Your Adventure
learning.desc: Tailored guides for every role in the colony.

A.name: Aggregate
A.description: The heart of the system where business rules live. Like organs in a body, they perform specific, vital functions.
A.detailedDescription: The central Aggregate (Carbon) bonds with everything. It provides the structure for the logic molecule.
A.dnaDescription: The structural core. Like Adenine pairs in DNA, Aggregates pair with logic to form the backbone of the system.

T.name: Transformation
T.description: Stateless processing units that convert data from one form to another without side effects.
T.detailedDescription: Transformations (Hydrogen) must follow the Law of Purity: Deterministic output based solely on input, with zero side effects. No database writes, no API calls, just pure logic.
T.dnaDescription: The processing unit. Like Thymine provides stability, Transformations provide pure, reliable logic processing.

C.name: Connector
C.description: Bridges to the outside world (APIs, Databases, UI). They translate external signals into internal language.
C.detailedDescription: Connectors (Oxygen) form strong double bonds, bridging the internal logic to the external world securely.
C.dnaDescription: The bridge. Like Cytosine bonds across the strand, Connectors bond the internal core to the external world.

G.name: Genesis Event
G.description: Significant moments of change. Events that trigger reactions across the hive or store state.
G.detailedDescription: Genesis Events (Nitrogen) have a directional "ionic" charge. They trigger reactions that flow outwards or signal change.
G.dnaDescription: The energy spark. Like Guanine enables energy transfer, Genesis Events trigger reactions and state changes.

lifecycle.title: The Metamorphosis of Code
lifecycle.desc: In the Hive, software is not "built" in a factory; it is "grown" organically. Every component follows the sacred biological lifecycle.

egg.name: The Egg
egg.desc: The potential of life. A standardized project structure is laid, waiting for logic to be injected.

larva.name: The Larva
larva.desc: Rapid growth. The bare minimum code file (scaffold) is generated. It consumes requirements to grow.

pupa.name: The Pupa
pupa.desc: Metamorphosis. The code is wrapped in a protective layer of tests. It hardens and validates its structure.

adult.name: The Adult
adult.desc: Flight. The component emerges with Dockerfiles and CI/CD config, ready to leave the hive and serve.

arch.title: The Queen's Chamber
arch.desc: The Hive Architecture strictly enforces the dependency rule. The Queen (Business Logic) knows nothing of the outside world. Workers (Adapters) protect her and translate all communication.

immune.idle: System Idle. Waiting for response trigger...

agent.title: Hive Mind Agent
agent.desc: An autonomous "Queen Bee" agent. It receives a goal and recursively calls tools until the goal is satisfied.

footer.quote: "In the end, we are all beekeepers, tending our digital hives with patience, wisdom, and love."
